_description: On the solitary life — ninety-six lines in thirteen eight-line stanzas

Lincoln100.First Lines:
Solitary lyf who so doith vsedepartid from werdely
                    mutabiliteþe vanyte þerof hym must refuseLyf contemplatif
                    thus teches me…
Lincoln100.Last Lines:
…Elles ye kan not skape gret aduersiteWhich god forfende
                    þat bought you to blisse
